title: Assign SR#0DIH-E7R5 to Case Worker

values.#v: You must accept this task before completing it

contents.tooltip: Accept this task to begin working on it
contents.label: Accept
Assign Customer Service Request to Case Worker
contents.instructions: Please select a Case Worker for this Request

contents.label: Request Type
contents.value: I need help with an Order

contents.requiredMessage: At least one item must be selected
contents.label: Related Product

columns.label: Product Name
data: Royal - 100X Medium Duty Shredder - Cross Cut...

contents.label: Request Comment
contents.value: Incorrect order was shipped to customer.  They will return and expect a refund.

contents.label: Available Case Workers
contents.instructions: User with less workload automatically selected. You may override selection.
contents.clearIconLabel: Clear value for Available Case Workers

contents.label: Assign Case Priority
contents.instructions: CRITICAL: Revenue-impacting enterprise issues that affect the entire company. HIGH: issues that may potentially become revenue impacting but do not affect the entire company. MEDIUM: issues affecting a single user or for enhancement requests that need to be completed to avoid impending revenue loss. LOW: issues that have known workarounds, issues that do not affect revenue, or enhancement suggestions.
contents.clearIconLabel: Clear value for Assign Case Priority

contents.requiredMessage: At least one item must be selected
contents.label: Workload per Case Worker
